metadata.Title: CVE-2023-46850 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Use after free in OpenVPN version 2.6.0 to 2.6.6 may lead to undefined behavoir, leaking memory buffers or remote execution when sending network buffers to a remote peer.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-46850` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

openvpn - 2.6.1-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openvpn package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6.1-1ubuntu1.1').
